description: Cross-device modifier test: Verifies that modifiers (like Shift) pressed on one device correctly affect keys pressed on another device. Tests multi-device state synchronization.
expected_behavior: Key 'A' pressed on device2 should output as Shift+A (uppercase A) because Shift is held on device1. Global modifier state must be shared across devices.
test_config: Requires global device scope for modifiers (not device-specific)
